attributes.action: Save the tag unit in the highlands of Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are appealing against the closing of the Tag unit in Auchtertyre (the highlands)Tag stands for training and guidance and supports people with mental health problems, we have always found funding to keep this place open although we are finding it much harder this year and have already lost a valuable member of staff due to the threat of closure.We have all gained from attending tag as have many others. Please sign this petition and help keep this important unit open.
